attributes.action: stand down as Prime Minister until such a time that he has been democratically elected by the voting public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We preach democratic principles to the developing world yet we now have a Prime Minister who has attained the highest office in our land without a single vote being cast. We should have, as part of our constitution, a law that enshrines that all Prime Ministers must be elected to the role in a general election. Should that not be a basic requirement of our democratic principles?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
